snippet.title: Madshot: Road to Madness - Trailer
snippet.description:
Try the demo during the Steam Next Fest and wishlist today: https://bit.ly/MadshotRoadToMadness
 
Slaughter endless abominations while moving stylishly through a Lovecraftian nightmare. Combine a multitude of unlockable weapons, abilities and upgrades in order to survive as long as possible, and reach the top of the leaderboards.
Madshot: Road to Madness it's a spin-off title from the original Madshot.
